text: Maria Leonor Gerona Robredo (born April 23, 1965) is a Filipina lawyer and politician. She was the 14th Vice President of the Philippines from June 30, 2016 t√≥ June 30, 2022. She served under Rodrigo Duterte. Robredo is the widow of the Philippines Interior Secretary Jesse Robredo. She served as Member of the House of Representatives from Camarines Sur's Third District. She is a member of the Liberal Party.It's final: Robredo runs for congress Rappler.com (2012-10-08)Leni Robredo proclaimed winner in Camarines Sur Inquirer.net (2013-05-22) In October 2021, Robredo announced her candidacy for president of the Philippines in the 2022 election. She came in second place in the general election in May 2022. ==Sources== Category:1965 births Category:Vice presidents of the Philippines Category:Living people Category:Filipino lawyers Category:Politicians from Camarines Sur
title: Leni Robredo
